attributes.action: Make it a crime for an MP to lie or mislead Parliament
attributes.additional_details: Hold Mps to account for providing false or misleading statements to Parliament. In effect no MP should be allowed to misrepresent the facts  or to coerce MPs through incorrect statements.whilst in the House Of Commons.
attributes.background: It should be a criminal act to knowingly mislead parliament. It should also be a crime to present false information that could mislead parliament.
